section.title: XTRACE_CRC16
section.programlisting: { XBYTE* buffer = ptrbuffer; \ XDWORD size = buffersize; \ XBYTE x; \ crc = 0xFFFF; \ while(size--) \ { \ x = crc >> 8 ^ * buffer++; \ x ^= x>>4; \ crc = (crc << 8) ^ ((XWORD)(x << 12)) ^ ((XWORD)(x <<5)) ^ ((XWORD)x); \ } \ }
